name: workshop-claude-code-amaleh-2026-final-v3
prompt:

ALL TEXT IN HEBREW. 3:2 horizontal format.

- Avatar looking at screen with SHOCKED expression, mouth open wide

- Hair completely blown back, dramatic shadows
- Dark moody office, green glow everywhere
